title: Peak Power of 2,000 Watts? Jonathan Milan’s Sprint Could Be Unstoppable at the Tour de France
content:
Italy’s sprinting ace Milan has been working on his only weakness. Can he challenge Philipsen and Merlier for sprint supremacy at the Tour de France?

Read the full article at Peak Power of 2,000 Watts? Jonathan Milan’s Sprint Could Be Unstoppable at the Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
